alert.note: Alert for Jackson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 13 at 8:57PM MDT until October 14 at 2:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Dakota... White River near Kadoka affecting Jackson County. For the White River...including Kadoka...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River near Kadoka. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Minor Flood Stage. Pasture land will be flooded with water over both banks. This is also the level where the river begins to spread out significantly. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM MDT Friday the stage was 14.6 feet. - Bankfull stage is 14.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 15.0 feet tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 900 AM MDT.
